document.full_text: standard & poor's threatened monday to downgrade the united states' prized aaa credit rating unless the obama administration and congress find a way to slash the yawning federal budget deficit within two years.
document.title: s&p threatens to cut u.s. credit rating on deficit
lines_and_colors: standard & poor's threatened monday to downgrade the united states' prized aaa credit rating unless the obama administration and congress find a way to slash the yawning federal budget deficit within two years.
